title: Spurious 30 minutes timeout on Travis CI

labels.name: A-spurious
labels.description: Area: Spurious failures in builds (spuriously == for no apparent reason)

labels.name: T-infra
labels.description: Relevant to the infrastructure team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
Symptom: The build just stops in the middle without any reason, and then got killed due to 30-minutes timeout.

Previous instances:

| Time | PR | Log | Last logged action |
|------|----|-----|--------------------|
| 2018-11-20T07:24:15Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/55663#issuecomment-440170496 | [dist-mipsel64-linux](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/457317644) | Compile stage0-rustc |
| 2018-11-14T07:08:11Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/55943#issuecomment-438560443 | [arm-android](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/454846373) | Download docker cache |
| 2018-11-13T12:22:23Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/55912#issuecomment-438247316 | [dist-i686-freebsd](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/454444949) | Clone submodules |
| 2018-11-13T11:48:10Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/55672#issuecomment-438238614 | [dist-x86_64-linux](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/454431087) | Clone submodules |
| 2018-11-13T07:04:10Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/55912#issuecomment-438159402 | [dist-mips-linux](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/454332517) | (not even booted up) |
| 2018-11-13T06:32:05Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/55136#issuecomment-438153417 | [i686-gnu](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/454295652) | Test liballoc |
| 2018-11-07T22:06:07Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/55717#issuecomment-436795052 | [dist-armhf-linux](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/452071971) | Build cargo |
| 2018-11-07T09:14:09Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/55717#issuecomment-436556235 | [x86_64-apple](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/451749494) | Test debuginfo |
| 2018-11-07T07:14:11Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/55510#issuecomment-436526853 | [arm-android](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/451741888) | Download docker cache |
